contents.aboutMe: Hello! I'm Jessica Prieto. I am a Web Enthusiast and a Front-End Developer. I enjoy designing and building websites.

A.name: Web Dev
A.description: I enjoy designing and developing web user interfaces. Aside from front-end, I also like exploring back-end dev and build more functionality to a site.
skills: building static web pages with HTML/CSS
using Angular 7 to create a single page website
building a full web application with ASP.NET and C#

B.name: Mobile Dev
B.description: I also enjoy developing the design and full functionality of mobile apps particularly for android.

C.name: Hobbies
C.description: Being active is something I really enjoy doing. Easy to say, I love being outdoors!
skills: going on hiking trips on the mountains
exploring new places and doing photography
performing music on stage and creating covers
